name: Pinball Mini
description:
5th Table Just Added!!!

Pinball Mini is a retro inspired pinball game. Included are four themed pinball tables, each offering unique challenges to conquer. Smooth gameplay, awesome retro art and plenty of challenges to keep you playing. Compete against players from around the world via Game Center High Scores. Each table is designed to allow players of any skill level to be competitive.

This is a great pick up and play game, so grab your FREE copy today!
